list.name: Changes
list.comment: Added unit and integration tests for UserController, UserService, TicketPurchaseController, refactored some previous tests

task.summary: Default task
Initial commit
Refactoring (implemented dto into Arena module)
Continuing working on feature№2 (for now, CRUD operations with sector's rows) + implementing necessary validation
Started working on feature№3 (for now, CRUD operations with sport_events)
Continuing working on feature№3 (did some refactoring)
Finished feature№3
Started implementing filtration/sorting/pagination (feature №4)
Continuing working on feature №4 (added filter-bar for sport events, arenas and tickets)
Working on features 5 and 6 (added visualization of available tickets and user's cart)
Almost finished features 5 and 6 (further details depend on implementing users authorization, so they are not completely finished)
Started implementing authorization (feature №7)
Implemented authorization (for now, without user ticket purchasing functionality)
Started ticket purchase functionality (with implemented authorization)
Managed concurrency when adding tickets into user's cart before committing purchase
Implemented committing purchase functionality + viewing purchased tickets
Tried to deploy (not fully successful yet)
Deployed with Docker (please, check README file in order to get info about admin credentials and check admin functionality when running the app)
Did some refactoring
Connected Hibernate. Started implementing Hibernate for User entity
Implemented Hibernate for User and Arena entities
Written tests for UserDao and ArenaDao
Added HikariCP connection pool + did some refactoring
Implemented Hibernate for SectorDao, added tests for SectorDao class + again some refactoring and java doc
Implemented Hibernate for SportEventDao
Started implementing Hibernate for remaining dao classes (for now, have some bugs and no unit-tests)
Continuing implementing Hibernate for remaining dao classes (fixed bugs, still no tests)
Started implementing language internationalization
Continuing implementing language internationalization (refactored all the .jsp files)
Finished implementing language internationalization
Added mappers, java doc (+ some refactoring in my jsp pages)
Moved some of the Hibernate db connection properties values into env vars
Started implementing Spring in Arena module (+ necessary config classes, dependencies)
Fixed existing configs. Now, application is starting, at least
Fixed Spring MVC config classes
Implemented MapStruct, fully implemented Spring into Arena module (except validation and filters/sorting/pagination), wrote tests
Implemented Spring into Sector module (basic CRUD operations, for now - now tests, no filtration/sorting/pagination)
Fixed controller and service unit-tests for Arena and Sector entities (+ refactored dto for Row entity)
Wrote integration tests for ArenaController and ServiceController functionality
Implemented Spring into Row module(no filtration/sorting/pagination functionality yet) + wrote tests and did some refactoring.
Connected QueryDSL
Implemented Spring into SportEvent module (for now, no filtration/sorting/pagination) + wrote tests, did some refactoring,
Implemented filtration/sorting/pagination using QueryDSL and JPA for Arena entities
Implemented filtration/sorting/pagination using QueryDSL and JPA for Sector/Row/SportEvent entities, added some unit-tests for services
Implemented Spring into admin Ticket module (crud-operations for admin with tickets and seats), wrote tests, + again some refactoring
Started implementing Spring Security (added dependencies, wrote config)
Implemented authorization/registration of users via Spring Security
Managed project packages, refactored view resolving, fixed tests after refactoring
Started implementing Spring for Ticket Purchase module (for now, viewing tickets for purchase and managing user cart is ready, but purchase itself is not yet)
Added unit and integration tests for UserController, UserService, TicketPurchaseController, refactored some previous tests
